comentario: A wonderful experience exploring the birds of Cuba. The site is informative and visually beautiful.
I loved the Zunzuncito section; it’s amazing to see how so much biodiversity is preserved!
Perfect for beginners in birdwatching. The photos, sounds, and information are top-notch.
